column2: These missile troops provide useful ranged support for the shock troops and massed slaves that predominate the armies of the Dawi Zharr.
Another example of the remarkable pyrotechnic abilities of the Dawi Zharr. Crews are usually volunteers who are either exceptionally brave or possibly slightly insane.
The Hobyars are Hobgoblin warrior nobles and their retainers. They form the highest caste of Hobgoblin nomad society, possessing the greatest wealth, prestige and martial prowess.
Only nobles of the Mourngul Khanate are permitted to ride the carefully domesticated Hobhound. Mercenaries and forerunners of the Mourngul Khanate abound in the Dark Lands.
Hobgoblin Khans command vast hordes of mounted raiders, something they share in common with the tribes of the Dark Lands who serve the Dawi Zharr.
Pulled by the enslaved Boar Centaurs, creations of a crazed Dawi Zharr inventor, these bladed monstrosities are imbued with a bound, raging daemon to wreak havoc upon the enemy.
Amongst the most powerful weapons within the Chaos Dwarf arsenal, these hulking behemoths combine the strength of the Giant race with the nigh-impenetrable armor of their masters.
